issue.title: [CI][C++] nproc isn't available on macOS
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-7542](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7542). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
https://github.com/apache/arrow/runs/382855556#step:5:32

```

ci/scripts/cpp_test.sh: line 31: nproc: command not found
```

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7542?focusedCommentId=17013313) by Neal Richardson (npr):*
